name: The Poker Player
credits:
HSymbol - original game
Rita-Bernstein - ZHS translation
description:
Adds a character called The Poker Player, who fights with his own rule inspired from poker.

- Adds 87 cards and 13 relics.
- Has 2 options in the config.
  - Enable Poker Player exclusive event for other characters in the config.
  - Disable unbalanced base game contents(on by default).

v0.8.6 (2019-06-16)
- Super Bite damage increased: 16(20) -> 20(24)
- Splitter damage decreased: 6 -> 5
- The first option from Exordium Club event now gives you 2~6 of clubs(was 3~7 of clubs)
- Fixed issue where Hot Shot Cut doubled damage incorrectly with Pen Nib relic.
- Fixed some grammar issues in card texts.
- Poker cards with rank 10 now have green name.

v0.8.7 (2019-06-30)
- Fixed crash for July patch
